title: Ashe and the new Omen
body:
With the new Randuin's Omen, how does Ashe compete with it? As her passive makes her auto attacks automatically crit, that means Ashe's damage as a whole against a champion with an Omen is reduced by 10%.

So, this in mind, is Ashe a viable option any more?

replies.body:
Get at least 1% Crit chance, then you will do at least equal damage to non-crit hit until you have absurdly high AD (like 1000 or so, which I am not sure you can actually reach). If they also take the mastery that reduces crit damage, build more crit chance.

{{item:3046}} is more than enough to make sure your crits will deal more damage than normal hits.

oh she's still really strong, omen is weaker against her now actually. it used to make it so that without her active a champ with omen would slow her down more than she slowed them down, and force her to activate her q to kite properly. Now she can properly kite tanks/bruisers, and though her damage might go down a bit she can at least do what she was meant to in the first place.
